docs.lead_paragraph: PROUD are the parents whose college-bound children choose to live in ''substance-free'' or ''wellness'' dorms. Residents voluntarily commit not to smoke, drink or use drugs and, in some cases, eschew loud music and pets, too. Well, not always entirely voluntarily: a good many times, it is really the parents who choose substance-free living or at least nudge their sons and daughters in that direction.
